snippet.title: Desta: The Memories Between - First Look / Behind the Scenes
snippet.description:
As first announced at #SummerGamesFest #DayOfTheDevs!

From the creators of Monument Valley, Desta: The Memories Between is a story of broken relationships, words left unsaid and the chance to explore your own dreams for answers.

Discover more about the development, the story-telling and the production of our most ambitious game in this exclusive first look!
